name: GetCustomProjectEnvironments
description:
Retrieve custom environments for a specified project.

Use this tool to get custom environments of a project on Vercel. These environments cannot be named 'Production' or 'Preview'.

parameters.name: project_id_or_name
parameters.description: The unique identifier or name of the project to retrieve custom environments.

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

parameters.name: git_branch_name
parameters.description: Specify the git branch to fetch custom environments from. This identifies the branch to retrieve environments for.

value_schema.description: Fetch custom environments for a specific git branch

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the Team to perform the request on behalf of. Expected as a string.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the team to perform the request on behalf of. This identifies the specific team related to the project.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: gitBranch
parameters.description: Fetch custom environments for a specific git branch

value_schema.description: Fetch custom environments for a specific git branch

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: idOrName
parameters.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name
